League 1
PSG: a record turnover for the club of the capital!
Shortly before the game against Brugge (1-0), Paris Saint-Germain unveiled its economic report for the 2018-2019 season. The club reached ‚Ç¨ 637.8 million of turnover.
07 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Charlie Creteur



1. Real Madrid (146,000) While some teams are not fully qualified, others already have their place for the upcoming European campaign. Discover the UEFA coefficient of qualified teams (or almost) .Icon Sport



2. FC Barcelona (138.000) Icon Sport



3. Bayern Munich (128,000) Icon Sport

PSG, Lille, OL: all the coefficients of the teams qualified for the C1




It's no secret that Paris Saint-Germain wants to compete with the European stars! If it is obvious that it goes through the sporting aspect, the club of the capital put big on the financial aspect. The economic daily Les Echos, revealed last night the economic balance of the PSG for the year 2018-2019. For example, the Ile-de-France club reported a record turnover of ‚Ç¨ 637.8 million during the year, which represents an increase of 17.7%.




Far from Bar√ßa and Real Madrid




Leonardo + 33 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

However, these figures are still far from those of FC Barcelona or Real Madrid, for example, which account for almost ‚Ç¨ 1 billion and ‚Ç¨ 757 million respectively. Paris Saint-Germain intends to rely on its two large sponsorship contracts concluded the same year with Nike and All, valued in particular at ‚Ç¨ 150 million a year to hope to continue to get into the nails of financial fair play and get closer financially. other big clubs.
